hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct s from Student s, School ss, Professional pp where (:name is null or s.name like :name) and (:schoolId is null or (ss.id = s.schoolId and s.schoolId = :schoolId)) and (:professionalId is null or (pp.id = s.professionalId and s.professionalId = :professionalId)) and (:telePhone is null or s.telePhone like :telePhone) and (:requirement is null or s.requirement like :requirement) and (:grade is null or s.grade = :grade) and (:status is null or s.status = :status) order by s.updateDate desc
from Student as s where s.telePhone = :telePhone
